languages.text: "Главная тронная зала находится вверх по лестнице и прямо. Ваш подданный Ахиллеас Скаландр уведомил меня, что смиренно ожидает возможности встретиться с вами именно там".

traits.locale_text: "Главная тронная зала находится вверх по лестнице и прямо. Ваш подданный Ахиллеас Скаландр уведомил меня, что смиренно ожидает возможности встретиться с вами именно там".

languages.text: "The main throne room is up the stairs and straight ahead. Your subject Achilleas Scalander informed me that he humbly awaits the opportunity to meet with you there."
languages.original_text: "Главная тронная зала находится вверх по лестнице и прямо. Ваш подданный Ахиллеас Скаландр уведомил меня, что смиренно ожидает возможности встретиться с вами именно там".

traits.locale_text: "The main throne room is up the stairs and straight ahead. Your subject Achilleas Scalander informed me that he humbly awaits the opportunity to meet with you there."
"The main throne room is up the stairs and straight ahead. Your subject Achilleas Scalander informed me that he humbly awaits the opportunity to meet with you there."
"The main throne room is up the stairs and straight ahead. Your subject Achilleas Scalander informed me that he humbly awaits the opportunity to meet with you there."
"The main throne room is up the stairs and straight ahead. Your subject Achilleas Scalander informed me that he humbly awaits the opportunity to meet with you there."

languages.text: “王座大厅就在楼梯上面，一直往前走就到了。您的臣民阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德告诉我，说他谦卑地等待着与您在那里见面的机会。”
languages.original_text: "The main throne room is up the stairs and straight ahead. Your subject Achilleas Scalander informed me that he humbly awaits the opportunity to meet with you there."

traits.locale_text: “王座大厅就在楼梯上面，一直往前走就到了。您的臣民阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德告诉我，说他谦卑地等待着与您在那里见面的机会。”

languages.text: «El salón del trono principal está subiendo las escaleras, todo recto. Su súbdito, Achilleas Scalander, me informa de que quiere hablar con usted en cuanto pueda».
languages.original_text: "The main throne room is up the stairs and straight ahead. Your subject Achilleas Scalander informed me that he humbly awaits the opportunity to meet with you there."

traits.locale_text: «El salón del trono principal está subiendo las escaleras, todo recto. Su súbdito, Achilleas Scalander, me informa de que quiere hablar con usted en cuanto pueda».

languages.text: 「王座の間は、階段を登ってまっすぐ進んだ先にございます。陛下の部下であるアキレアス・スカランダーが、そちらでお待ちしているそうです」
languages.original_text: "The main throne room is up the stairs and straight ahead. Your subject Achilleas Scalander informed me that he humbly awaits the opportunity to meet with you there."

traits.locale_text: 「王座の間は、階段を登ってまっすぐ進んだ先にございます。陛下の部下であるアキレアス・スカランダーが、そちらでお待ちしているそうです」

languages.text: "Der Hauptthronsaal befindet sich die Treppen hinauf und dann geradeaus. Euer Untertan Achilleas Scalander hat mir gesagt, dass er demütig auf die Gelegenheit wartet, Euch dort zu treffen."
languages.original_text: "The main throne room is up the stairs and straight ahead. Your subject Achilleas Scalander informed me that he humbly awaits the opportunity to meet with you there."

traits.locale_text: "Der Hauptthronsaal befindet sich die Treppen hinauf und dann geradeaus. Euer Untertan Achilleas Scalander hat mir gesagt, dass er demütig auf die Gelegenheit wartet, Euch dort zu treffen."

languages.text: « La salle du trône se trouve tout droit en haut des escaliers. Achilleas Scalander, l'un de vos sujets, espère en toute humilité avoir la chance de vous y rencontrer. »
languages.original_text: "The main throne room is up the stairs and straight ahead. Your subject Achilleas Scalander informed me that he humbly awaits the opportunity to meet with you there."

traits.locale_text: « La salle du trône se trouve tout droit en haut des escaliers. Achilleas Scalander, l'un de vos sujets, espère en toute humilité avoir la chance de vous y rencontrer. »

languages.text: "Ana taht odası, merdivenlerden çıkınca dümdüz ileride. Kulunuz Achilleas Scalander beni, orada sizinle görüşme fırsatını iple çektiği hususunda bilgilendirdi."
languages.original_text: "The main throne room is up the stairs and straight ahead. Your subject Achilleas Scalander informed me that he humbly awaits the opportunity to meet with you there."

traits.locale_text: "Ana taht odası merdivenlerin yukarısında ve dümdüz ileride. Kulunuz Achilleas Scalander beni, orada sizinle görüşme fırsatını iple çektiği konusunda bilgilendirmişti."
